掃地.definition: to sweep the floor; (fig.) (of one's reputation etc) to reach rock bottom; to be at an all-time low

掃地僧.definition: Sweeper Monk, nameless monk who maintains the library of Shaolin (from Jin Yong's novel "Demigods and Semidevils" 天龍八部|天龙八部[Tian1 long2 Ba1 Bu4]); (fig.) person whose remarkable talents are not well known

掃堂腿.definition: (martial arts) floor-sweeping kick (to trip one's opponent)

掃墓.definition: to sweep a grave (and pay one's respects to the dead person)

掃射.definition: to rake with machine gunfire; to strafe; to machine-gun down

掃尾.definition: to complete the last stage of work; to round off

掃帚星.definition: comet; person who brings bad luck; jinx

掃把星.definition: comet; person who brings bad luck; jinx

掃碼.definition: to scan a QR code or barcode

掃興.definition: to spoil things; to dampen spirits; to feel deflated; to be dispirited

掃蕩.definition: (military) to mop up; to crack down on; to eradicate

掃街.definition: to sweep the streets; to canvas (for votes, sales etc)

掃視.definition: to run one's eyes over; to sweep one's eyes over

掃貨.definition: to go on a shopping spree; to buy in bulk

掃除.definition: to clean; to clean up; to eliminate; to wipe out

掃除天下.definition: (idiom) to re-establish order throughout the empire

掃黃打非.definition: to eradicate pornography and illegal publications

掃黑.definition: to crack down on illegal activities; to fight organized crime
